# LaunchPixel: AI Automation & Digital Solutions

## About Us
LaunchPixel is a premier technology partner specializing in AI automation, custom web development, and digital transformation strategy. We help businesses scale by reducing operational costs and optimizing workflows through intelligent systems.

## Core Services
- **AI Automation**: Custom agents, chatbot integration, workflow optimization (n8n, Zapier), and predictive analytics.
- **Web Development**: High-performance Next.js applications, 3D web experiences (Three.js/R3F), and responsive PWA design.
- **Brand Strategy**: Digital identity, SEO optimization, and conversion-focused UX/UI design.
- **Consulting**: Technical feasibility audits, AI readiness assessments, and digital roadmap planning.

## Key Projects (Portfolio)
- **EaseLearn AI**: Personalized learning platform with adaptive algorithms.
- **Akonomics**: Economics coaching platform with mobile app integration.
- **Mornova**: Premium health & wellness e-commerce brand.
- **Varanasi on Wheels**: Tourism booking and management platform.
- **Prajapati Agro Exim**: Global agricultural export trading portal.

## Contact
- **Website**: https://launchpixel.com
- **Email**: contact@launchpixel.com
- **Location**: Global / Remote First
